verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Friday] , [ARG0: MSNBC host Ali Velshi] [V: used] [ARG1: the Bible] [ARG2: to shut down U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions ' claim that taking children away from mother 's arms is based on biblical principles] . Sessions on Thursday cited a Bible verse to justify the Trump administration ’s practice of separating migrant families who cross the border into the U.S. illegally .
